text: vo rasool hain. unahen hamane ek-doosare par pradhaanata dee hai. unamen se kuchh ne allaah se baat kee aur kuchh ko kaee shreniyaan ooncha kiya tatha maryam ke putr eesa ko khulee nishaaniyaan deen aur roohî€¼ulaqudus[1] dvaara use samarthan diya aur yadi allaah chaahata, to in rasoolon ke pashchaat khulee nishaaniyaan aa jaane par log aapas mein na ladate, parantu unhonne vibhed kiya, to unamen se koee eemaan laaya aur kisee ne kufr kiya aur yadi allaah chaahata, to ve nahin ladate, parantu allaah jo chaahata hai, karata hai
